column1: I offer you a neutral greeting
column3: I strive to portray the complexities of human nature without bias or judgment.

column2: I extend a greeting free from personal inclination
column3: seeking only to understand and portray the human condition.

column1: May this neutral salutation embody the spirit of objectivity
column2: as I delve into the vast tapestry of human emotions and experiences.

column3: for neutrality allows me to capture the essence of diverse perspectives within my writings.

column1: Let this neutral hello remind you of the power of empathy and understanding
